title: Casting Stones, New Unabridged Version
description: James Raven is a man who needs to be saved. Poor choices, guilt, and desperation trap him in a marriage he doesn't want to survive. Salvation comes in its own good time and with a heavy price.Bloodstained hands will bury secrets deep in the Loess Hills of Missouri. Stones now cover a tragic past yet the question remains…how long can a man hide his sins.Casting Stones – New Unabridged Version, includes three stories of the Casting Stones series published in early 2012: Prelude, Casting Stones and Conclusions.
author: Gina Marie Barlean
